server

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.NetworkNode
      • server.Server

  • public class Server
extends NetworkNode
    This class represents the server that manages all the clients
    Author:
    Calvin

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Server(RenderManager fractal, double zoomSpeed, java.lang.String directory)
      Creates a server using the given fractal, the given zoom speed, and that will save images to the selected directory

    • Constructor Detail

      • Server

        public Server(RenderManager fractal,
              double zoomSpeed,
              java.lang.String directory)
        Creates a server using the given fractal, the given zoom speed, and that will save images to the selected directory
        Parameters:
        fractal - the fractal the network render
        zoomSpeed - the speed at which the rendered images will zoom into the fractal
        directory - the directory the rendered images will be saved to

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init(Log log)
        This method actually starts the server using the given log to output information/
        Parameters:
        log - the log where information will be output to

      • handleMessage

        public void handleMessage(java.lang.Object o,
                          SocketWrapper sender)
        When a SocketWrapper recieves a message of any kind, it call that method. Hence, this method described what to do when different types of messages are recieved.
        Parameters:
        o - the message recieved
        sender - the SocketWrapper that revieved the message (or, from the perspective of the server, the client that sent the message)

      • getAdminParameters

        public Parameters getAdminParameters()
        Returns the parameters that admins might be concerned with. This includes parameters and statistics. All of this data can be viewed from the NetworkView menu
        Returns:
        the parameters admins might be concerned with.

      • updateParameters

        public void updateParameters(Parameters params)
        This method is used by the Display to modify the parameters of the network. After the server updates its own fractal with the new parameters, it then sends that very fractal out to all the clients.
        Parameters:
        params - the new parameters for the fractal

      • moveFromUncompletedToUnassigned

        public void moveFromUncompletedToUnassigned(SocketWrapper w)
        Parameters:
        w - is a socket wrapper Moves the job w was working on from uncompleted to unassigned
